title: Gloucester Cathedral
brief_description: A study of Gloucester Cathedral; within the building are great circular columns of Norman architecture; vaulting of the nave and choir is rich in style; painted glass windows date from the 14th century; detailed studies of the cloisters and the fan tracery.
